description.narrative: To serve as a midterm analysis of the program to date. The evaluation will provide both the Foundation and the Legatum Center with details and analyses that will allow for them to assess the performance of the program against its intended goals and objectives, as well as offer evidence that will shape the program moving forward. It is expected that the contents of the evaluation will allow for a review of program design, achievements, and challenges in order to generate key lessons for future strategic and programming decisions.
